text: Nikanor "Nika" Melia (born 21 December 1979) is a Georgian politician. He was a member of Parliament of Georgia from 2016 to 2019. He is also a member of parliament of Georgia from United National Movement since December 2020. He holds a master's degree in International Relations from Oxford Brookes University. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1979 births Category:Members of the Parliament of Georgia Category:United National Movement (Georgia) politicians Category:Living people
title: Nika Melia
